thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 6 de 669
thread.title: Adam Balfour

author: Adam Balfour
title: Adam Balfour
text: No need to buy recommended "get ahead of the queue ticket" at 50 euros, as there was no queue. Collecting car went fine - but there were a number of unrecorded scratches. Car was full of petrol and I returned it full. An undisclosed "admin fee" has been kept for checking the petrol. There is a link to the "admin fee". Nothing shows ! My guess it is around 30 euro. Car was fine. Return went fine. All in all a reasonable service.
